name: easyBot
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: easy bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows users to run small communication bots on Alexa-enabled devices such as the Echo that they have built themselves on easybot.me/easybot-en/. After a bot is built, a bot key is generated. 
When running the easyBot skill for the first time, say 'bot key' to enter your bot key by voice to run a bot you built. If the bot key matches, you will be able to run your bot. 
Alternatively, you can also say "sample bot" to run a sample bot without needing to provide a bot key.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
